body:
Basically atm I have an apu and I have. A budget of about 130£ for a graphics card which will get me high frame rate on most games. 
Leave suggestions please ❤️

title: Graphics card help

replies.body: I recommend the GTX 770 which is 96.40£, I use it and my minimum fps on minecraft is around 200.
replies.body_tagged: I recommend the GTX 770 which is 96.40£, I use it and my minimum fps on minecraft is around 200.

replies.body:
Minecraft is CPU intensive. To my knowledge, having a good GPU or not makes no difference.

@OP Where do you live?

replies.body: I'm not. Minecraft is a game COMPLETELY based off Java, and Java is CPU intensive. If he's going to play other games though, he should get a new GPU.

replies.body:
this one is really good!

http://www.amazon.co.uk/Asus-Nvidia-PCI-E-Graphics-Card/dp/B00SKWIISQ 

It is in sale now on amazon UK.

I have this one In my pc and I get about 400 fps while recording with 60 fps and I don't even use optfine then.

Btw good luck with buying one ;)
